00022 
00023 QList<StkIf*> StkOfonoUtils::findSimToolkitInterfaces(const QDBusConnection &connection, MgrIf *mgrIf)
00024 {
00025     QList<StkIf*> simToolkitInterfaces;
00026     QDBusError dbusError;
00027     // org.ofono.Manager interface GetModems method
00028     QDBusPendingReply<OfonoModemList> modemsCall = mgrIf->GetModems();
00029     modemsCall.waitForFinished();
00030     if (modemsCall.isError()) {
00031         dbusError = modemsCall.error();
00032         qDebug() << "Error:" << dbusError.name() << ":" << dbusError.message();
00033         return simToolkitInterfaces;
00034     }
00035     // loop foreach modem, find the first org.ofono.SimToolkit interface
00036     // in order to pass it to the SimToolkit main window
00037     foreach(const OfonoModem &pms, modemsCall.value()) {
00038         bool foundSimToolkit = false;
00039         // loop interfaces to find "org.ofono.SimToolkit"
00040         foreach(const QString &interface, pms.varmap.value("Interfaces").toStringList())
00041         {
00042             if (interface == "org.ofono.SimToolkit")
00043             {
00044                 foundSimToolkit = true;
00045                 break;
00046             }
00047         }
00048         if (foundSimToolkit)
00049         {
00050             // Instanciate proxy for org.ofono.SimToolkit interface
00051             simToolkitInterfaces.append(new StkIf("org.ofono",pms.objpath.path(),connection,NULL));
00052         }
00053     }
00054     return simToolkitInterfaces;
00055 }
